member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidAxes
member.summary: Represents the 3D or 2D axes that a fluid simulates or emits from.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ResolutionComparison
member.summary: Represents the comparison between two resolutions by aspect ratio.
member.remarks: Used in the FluidProfile class.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.PhoneGeneration
member.summary: Represents an iPhone Generation. Equiavlent to UnityEngine.iPhone.generation.
member.remarks: Used in the FluidProfile class.

members.member:
The type of broad phase to use for the fluid solver.
None - Useful for particle counts of 100 or less Octrees have a fixed maximum range, but do not need to be rebalanced. They use approximate radius search. k-d trees do not have a maximum range, but must be rebalanced as particles move around. They use k-nearest neighbor search.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid
member.summary: Main fluid component.

member.name: E:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.OnPreSolve
member.summary: Occurs every fixed update, before the fluid solver runs.

member.name: E:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.OnPostSolve
member.summary: Occurs every fixed update, after the fluid solver runs.

member.name: E:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.OnAllocation
member.summary: Occurs whenever new particles are allocated or deallocated.

member.name: E:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.OnFluidEmission
member.summary: Occurs on every particle emission.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.emitters
member.summary: Gets an array of the fluid's emitters. (Allocates a new array)

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.particles
member.summary: Gets an array of the fluid's particles. (Allocates a new array)

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.plugins
member.summary: Gets an array of the fluid's plugins. (Allocates a new array)

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.solverEnabled
member.summary: Controls whether or not the fluid's solver is enabled.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.playOnEnable
member.summary: Should fluid simulation automatically play when enabled?

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.isPlaying
member.summary: Is the fluid currently playing?

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.particleCount
member.summary: Gets the fluid's particle count. (Includes inactive particles)

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.activeParticleCount
member.summary: Gets the fluid's active particle count.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.emitterCount
member.summary: Gets the fluid's emitter count.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.pluginCount
member.summary: Gets the fluid's plugin count.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.useGravity
member.summary: Controls whether or not the fluid will use global gravity settings.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.simulationScale
member.summary: Controls the global simulation scale of the fluid.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.dimensions
member.summary: The simulation dimensions for the fluid.
member.remarks: 2D fluids have special optimizations in place, and can usually support higher particle counts.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.layer
member.summary: Gets or sets the layer associated with the fluid. Also sets the internal layer mask.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.broadPhaseType
member.summary: Gets the type of the broad phase used by the fluid. (Read only)

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.broadPhaseSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the broad phase, in world space. @warning Changing this value at runtime may corrupt a fluid's state.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.broadPhaseOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the position offset of the broad phase, relative to the fluid. @warning Changing this value at runtime may corrupt a fluid's state.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.particleSkinWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a fluid's particle skin width. Skin width controls how far a particle must travel before recalculating the broad phase.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.smoothingDistance
member.summary: Gets or sets the smoothing distance of fluid particles. @warning Changing this value at runtime may corrupt a fluid's state.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.maxInteractions
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum amount of interactions allowed per particle per frame. Changing this value at runtime may allocate garbage.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.particleMass
member.summary: Gets or sets the mass of each fluid particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.fluidMass
member.summary: Returns the total mass of a fluid.
member.remarks: This is a shortcut for particleMass * activeParticleCount.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.initialDensity
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial density of each fluid particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.minimumDensity
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum density of each fluid particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.viscosity
member.summary: Gets or sets the viscosity of a fluid.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.gasConstant
member.summary: Gets or sets the gas constant of a fluid.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.interactiveForce
member.summary: Gets or sets the interactive force applied to a fluid.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.damping
member.summary: Gets or sets the physical damping applied to a fluid.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.velocityLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the velocity limit of each fluid particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.velocityDampen
member.summary: Gets or sets the velocity dampen amount.
member.remarks: Particle velocities are dampened if they are greater than velocityLimit. For example, A value of 1 will reduce a particle's velocity by 100%. A value of .5 will reduce a particle's velocity by 50%.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.solverIterationCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the solver iteration count. Increase this value to increase stability at the cost of performance. It is not recommended to set this higher than 2.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.material
member.summary: The material associated with a fluid.
member.remarks: This will return null if the fluid does not have an associated particle system.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.materials
member.summary: The materials list associated with a fluid.
member.remarks: This will return null if the fluid does not have an associated particle system.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.sharedMaterial
member.summary: The shared material associated with a fluid.
member.remarks: This will return null if the fluid does not have an associated particle system.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid.sharedMaterials
member.summary: The shared materials list associated with a fluid.
member.remarks: This will return null if the fluid does not have an associated particle system.

member.summary: Writes the fluid's emitters into an array. This will automatically resize the array, if needed.

member.summary: Writes the fluid's particles into an array.
member.returns: The amount of particles written into the array.

member.summary: Gets a fluid particle by index.

member.summary: Sets a single fluid particle by index.

member.summary: Sets a single fluid particle by index.

member.summary: Despawns a fluid particle.

member.summary: Find all fluids matching the name specified.
member.param: The name of the fluid to search for.
member.returns: The matching fluids. Returns if not found.

member.summary: Gets all active fluids.
member.returns: All active fluids in the scene.

member.summary: Simulate a fluid for the specified deltaTime.
member.remarks: This method can be used to simulate the fluid at a different speed.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle
member.summary: Represents a fluid particle.
member.remarks: This object is a value type - when modifying a particle, it must be reapplied into the fluid array.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.emitter
member.summary: Gets the parent emitter associated with this particle. (Read only)

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.enabled
member.summary: If true, the particle is currently enabled.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.position
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.velocity
member.summary: Gets or sets the velocity of the particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.particleLife
member.summary: Gets or sets the particle's life.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.startLife
member.summary: Gets the start life of the particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.lifetime
member.summary: Gets the lifetime of the particle, from 0-1. Returns 1 when particleLife = startLife, or if the startLife is Infinity.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.smoothingDistance
member.summary: Gets the smoothing distance of the particle.

member.summary: Gets the current density of the particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.pressure
member.summary: Gets the current pressure of the particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.mass
member.summary: Gets or sets the mass of the particle. Changing this value may produce non-physical behaviour.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.ID
member.summary: Gets the particle's ID. This number is unique to the particle within the fluid.
member.remarks: Returns -1 for disabled/invalid particles.

member.summary: Gets a list of IDs, representing a particle's neighbors. (Allocates a new array)

member.summary: Resets the mass data of a particle.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.GetNeighbors(System.Int32[]@)
member.summary: Writes the particle's neighbors into an array. This will automatically resize the array, if needed.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.GetNeighbors(System.Int32[])
member.summary: Writes the particle's neighbors into an array.
member.returns: The amount of neighbors written into the array.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.AddForce(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Adds the specified force to the particle.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle.AddForce(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.ForceMode)
member.summary: Adds the specified force to the particle, using a specific force mode.
member.remarks: ForceMode.Force: f0 += f1 ForceMode.Acceleration: f0 += f1 * invMass ForceMode.Impulse: f0 += f1 / dt ForceMode.VelocityChange: f0 += (f1 * invMass) / dt

member.summary: MonoBehavior base class for all Fluvio components.

member.summary: This property provides a cached version the component's transform for performance reasons.

member.summary: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the BinaryHeap, if that number is less than a threshold value.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.FluidIndexGrid
member.summary: Implementation of an index grid broad phase
member.remarks: This is an internal class.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree
member.summary: Organizes points into a kd-tree structure.
member.remarks: This class implements a data structure that stores a list of points in space. A common task in game programming is to take a supplied point and discover which of a stored set of points is nearest to it. The kd-tree allows this "nearest neighbour" search to be carried out quickly, or at least much more quickly than a simple linear search through the list. The nearest-neighbour search returns an integer index - it is assumed that the original array of points is available for the lifetime of the tree, and the index refers to that array.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.MakeFromPoints(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector3[])
member.summary: Make a new tree from a list of points.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.Regenerate(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree,System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector3[])
member.summary: Regenerate a tree from a list of points, reusing any old objects from the root.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.Rebalance(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree)
member.summary: Rebalance the tree.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.FindNearest(UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Find the nearest point in the set to the supplied point.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.FindNearest(UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Find the nearest point in the set to the supplied point, up to the maximum square distance.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.FindNearest(UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Int32)
member.summary: Find the nearest points in the set up to the maximum amount.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.FindNearest(UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Find the nearest points in the set up to the maximum amount, up to the maximum square distance.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.FindNearest(UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Int32[],System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Find the nearest points in the set up to the maximum amount, up to the maximum square distance.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.K_NN(UnityEngine.Vector3,ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.HyperRect,System.Single,System.Int32,ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.NeighborList)
member.summary: K-Nearest neighbor algorithm

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.BroadPhase.KdTree.Dump(System.Int32)
member.summary: Simple output of tree structure - mainly useful for getting a rough idea of how deep the tree is (and therefore how well the splitting heuristic is performing).

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEllipsoidEmitter.position
member.summary: The position offset (in local space) of the emitter.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEllipsoidEmitter.worldPosition
member.summary: The world space position to emit from.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEllipsoidEmitter.dimensions
member.summary: The dimensions (in local space) of the ellipsoid.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEllipsoidEmitter.force
member.summary: The force (in local space) applied to all particles on emission.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEllipsoidEmitter.worldForce
member.summary: The force (in world space) applied to all particles on emission.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter
member.summary: Base class for emitter components.

member.name: E:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.OnFluidEmission
member.summary: Occurs on every particle emission.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.particles
member.summary: Gets an array of the emitter's particles. (Allocates a new array)

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.emit
member.summary: Controls particle emission.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.isEmitting
member.summary: Whether or not the emitter is emitting particles.
member.remarks: Returns false if: - The application is in edit mode - The emitter is disabled, emission is disabled, or emission/maxParticles are set to 0 - The emitter has reached max particles and currently cannot emit any more.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.emission
member.summary: The amount of particles to emit per emission pulse.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.maxParticles
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum amount of particles allowed from this emitter.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.minEmitTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time between emissions. This will never actually be lower than the fixed timestep.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.initialDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the initial delay before the first emission.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.oneShotOnMax
member.summary: If enabled, emission will stop once the maximum amount of particles has been reached.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.maxParticleDistance
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum distance a particle can go from the emitter. Particles outside of this range will be automatically destroyed.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.emitterLife
member.summary: Gets or sets the life of the emitter. After this period of time, the emitter will automatically stop emission.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.particleLife
member.summary: Gets or sets the base life of a particle. Particle life is calculated as a range between (life - jitter) and (life + jitter).

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.particleLifeJitter
member.summary: Gets or sets the life jitter of a particle. Particle life is calculated as a range between (life - jitter) and (life + jitter).

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.forceMultiplier
member.summary: Gets or sets the force multiplier applied to the emission force.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.particleCount
member.summary: Gets the amount of particles belonging to this emitter.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.emissionCenter
member.summary: Gets the emitter's center. The location of this point depends on the type of emitter as well as the position of the object's transform.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.ChangeEmitPosition
member.summary: The function to change the emission position. This is run on every particle emission.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.ChangeEmitForce
member.summary: The function to change the emission force. This is run on every particle emission.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.Initialize
member.summary: The emitter initialization method.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.GetEmissionCenter
member.summary: Gets the emission center of the emitter.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.EmitOne
member.summary: Emits one particle, increasing the fluid's maximum particle count if needed.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.EmitOne(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Emits one particle, if possible. If increaseMaxParticles = true, the fluid's maximum particle count will be increased by one.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.EmitOne(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3)
member.summary: Emit a particle at the specified position and force, increasing the fluid's maximum particle count if needed.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.EmitOne(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Emit a particle at the specified position and force. If increaseMaxParticles = true, the fluid's maximum particle count will be increased by one.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.EmitOne(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle)
member.summary: Emit a particle based on a specified template particle, increasing the fluid's maximum particle count if needed.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.EmitOne(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Emit a particle based on a specified template particle. If increaseMaxParticles = true, the fluid's maximum particle count will be increased by one.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.Emit
member.summary: Starts emission.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.Emit(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Starts or stops emission.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.Emit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts emission, and increases the fluid's maximum particle count by the specified amount.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.GetParticles(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle[]@)
member.summary: Writes the emitter's particles into an array. This will automatically resize the array, if needed.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidEmitter.GetParticles(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle[])
member.summary: Writes the emitter's particles into an array.
member.returns: The amount of particles written into the array.

member.summary: The force (in world space) applied to all particles on emission.

member.summary: Determines whether particles should emit in a uniform fashion.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Emitters.FluidLineEmitter.spacing
member.summary: If uniform = true, determines the particle spacing.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidTreeQueryCallback
member.summary: Fluid tree query callback. This is run during a nearest-neighbor search.
member.param: The position to query the tree with.
member.returns: If true, continue the query - if false, terminate the query.
member.remarks: This is implemented as an interface to avoid memory issues in Mono with C# delegates.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase
member.summary: Represents a spacial tree broadphase for tracking fluid particle positions.
member.remarks: Fluid trees use integer ID proxies.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.isDirty
member.summary: A flag that is set when the tree is dirty.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.version
member.summary: Gets the version of the tree. Use this to detect changes.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.AddProxy(UnityEngine.Vector3@)
member.summary: Adds a proxy to the tree at the specified position. This marks the tree for rebalancing.
member.returns: The proxy ID of the newly created proxy.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.RemoveProxy(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes a proxy from the tree. This marks the tree for rebalancing.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.MoveProxy(System.Int32,UnityEngine.Vector3@)
member.summary: Moves a proxy within the tree. This will mark the tree for rebalancing if the squared position delta is larger than the fluid's particle skin width.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.Rebalance
member.summary: Rebalance the tree. This will synchronize all proxies.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.SetCapacity(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the capacity for particle proxies.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.Query(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidTreeQueryCallback,UnityEngine.Vector3@,System.Single)
member.summary: Queries the tree, doing a nearest-neighbor search. The callback is run for every neighbor found until finished/terminated by the user.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.DrawDebug(UnityEngine.Camera)
member.summary: Draws debug information for the tree.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidBroadPhase.SetDirty
member.summary: Marks the tree for rebalancing.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidObject
member.summary: Represents an object associated with a fluid.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidObject.fluid
member.summary: Gets or sets the fluid that this object belongs to.

member.summary: Interface type for fluid solvers.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidSolver.enabled
member.summary: If true, enables the physics solver.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidSolver.Synchronize
member.summary: Synchronize all proxies for the broadphase.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidSolver.ClearForces
member.summary: Clears all forces in the solver.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidSolver.SetCellSpace(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Fluid)
member.summary: Sets the cell space for the solver.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidSolver.StartSolverFrame(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluvioTimeStep@)
member.summary: Starts the solver frame.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidSolver.FindNeighbors
member.summary: Finds all neighbors.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidSolver.Solve(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluvioTimeStep@)
member.summary: Run the solver for one frame.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidSolver.IntegrateVelocities(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluvioTimeStep@,UnityEngine.Vector3@)
member.summary: Performs integration of solver data into positions and velocities.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IFluidSolver.ApplyPositionAndVelocityConstraints(ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.FluidParticle@)
member.summary: Applies position and velocity constraints to the particle.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IResettable
member.summary: Defines an object that can be reset to a default state.

member.name: E:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IResettable.OnResetObject
member.summary: Occurs after the object has been reset.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.IResettable.ResetObject
member.summary: Resets the object to its default state.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionPlugin
member.summary: Represents a fluid plugin that listens for collision events.
member.remarks: \note Collision events create additional overhead and only work with rigidbody particles.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionPlugin.OnFluidCollisionEnter(UnityEngine.Collision)
member.summary: This event occurs when a fluid particle enters into a collision with another object.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionPlugin.OnFluidCollisionStay(UnityEngine.Collision)
member.summary: This event occurs on every physics frame while a fluid particle is in collision with another object.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionPlugin.OnFluidCollisionExit(UnityEngine.Collision)
member.summary: This event occurs when a fluid particle ceases to collide with another object.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound
member.summary: FluidPlugin that plays audio on collision.
member.remarks: Collision messages must be enabled.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound.collisionSource
member.summary: The audio source for collisions.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound.collisionVelocity
member.summary: The minimum velocity for a collision sound to play.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound.minCollisions
member.summary: The minimum amount of collisions to play a collision sound.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound.collisionFadeTime
member.summary: The fade time for the collision sound.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound.highImpactSource
member.summary: The audio source for high impact collisions.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound.impactVelocity
member.summary: The minimum velocity for a high impact sound to play.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound.minHighImpactCollisions
member.summary: The minimum amount of high impact collisions before playing a sound.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound.scalePitchWithTime
member.summary: Whether or not the audio's pitch should scale with the time scale.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidCollisionSound.onlyPlayIfFluidIsPlaying
member.summary: If enabled, audio will pause whenever the fluid is paused.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug
member.summary: FluidPlugin for debug information.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.initialState
member.summary: The initial state of fluid visualization. If enabled, fluid lines will be drawn on plugin initialization.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.drawVelocity
member.summary: Controls whether or not to draw velocity lines.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.drawParticles
member.summary: Controls whether or not to draw particles.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.drawSmoothingDistances
member.summary: Controls whether or not to draw smoothing distances.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.drawBroadPhase
member.summary: Controls whether or not to draw the broad phase.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.drawOnKeyPress
member.summary: Controls whether to draw on key press or when toggled.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.key
member.summary: The key to to press to toggle fluid lines.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.lineColor
member.summary: The main color of the fluid lines.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.densityColor1
member.summary: The color of particles at minimum density.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.densityColor2
member.summary: The color of particles at maximum density.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.showDebugText
member.summary: Controls whether or not to show debug text.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.invertText
member.summary: Controls whether or not the debug text should be inverted.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.debugTextPosition
member.summary: The position (in GUI space) of the debug text.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.debugTextAlignment
member.summary: The debug text paragraph alignment.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.debugTextAnchor
member.summary: The debug text anchor point.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDebug.GetDebugText
member.summary: Gets the debug text GUIText component.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDestructor
member.summary: FluidPlugin that destroys all particles of a fluid that enter the trigger area.
member.remarks: Useful for drains and invisible areas. Optionally, the plugin can spawn splash particles when a particle is destroyed.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDestructor.destructionTime
member.summary: The delay before destroying a fluid particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDestructor.destructionTimeJitter
member.summary: A jitter applied to destructionTime.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDestructor.bounds
member.summary: The bounds of the destructor.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDestructor.splashParticleSystem
member.summary: (Unity 4+) Gets or sets the splash particle system. The splash particle system, if set, will emit when a fluid particle is destroyed.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDestructor.splashEmissionCount
member.summary: (Unity 4+) Gets or sets the splash emission count.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDestructor.splashEmissionOffset
member.summary: (Unity 4+) Gets or sets the splash emission offset.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidDestructor.splashEmissionEllipsoid
member.summary: (Unity 4+) Gets or sets the splash emission ellipsoid.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound
member.summary: FluidPlugin that controls the sounds associated with a fluid emitter.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.emissionClip
member.summary: The audio clip to play on emission.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.volume
member.summary: The volume of the audio clip.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.pitch
member.summary: The pitch of the audio clip.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.audioRangeMin
member.summary: The minimum range for the audio clip (3D audio only).

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.audioRangeMax
member.summary: The maximum range for the audio clip (3D audio only).

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.audioPriority
member.summary: The priority of the audio source. (Priority: 0 = most important. 256 = least important. Default = 128.)

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.fadeTime
member.summary: The fade time for the audio clip when not emitting.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.loop
member.summary: Whether or not the clip should loop.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.scalePitchWithTime
member.summary: Whether or not the clip's pitch should scale with the time scale.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidEmitterSound.onlyPlayIfFluidIsPlaying
member.summary: If enabled, audio will pause whenever the fluid is paused.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidParticleRenderer
member.summary: This plugin interfaces with the Shuriken particle system.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidParticleRenderer.useExternalForces
member.summary: If enabled, use external forces from the Shuriken particle system to influence Fluvio's simulation.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidParticleRenderer.renderInWorldSpace
member.summary: Whether or not the fluid is rendering in world space. This setting can be changed in the editor through Shuriken.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidPlugin
member.summary: Base class for fluid plugins.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidPlugin.OnEnable
member.summary: This is called by Unity when the object is enabled. Overriding classes MUST call base.OnEnable() to initialize the plugin properly.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidPlugin.OnDestroy
member.summary: This is called by Unity when the object is disabled. Overriding classes MUST call base.OnDestroy() to remove the plugin properly.

member.name: M:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidPlugin.Initialize
member.summary: Provides an initialization method for the fluid plugin.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidRigidbodyParticles
member.summary: FluidPlugin that creates rigidbodies for fluid particles.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidRigidbodyParticles.colliderSizeModifier
member.summary: Controls the size of physics colliders, as a multiple of smoothing distance.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidRigidbodyParticles.massModifier
member.summary: Controls the mass of rigidbodies, as a multiple of particle mass.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidRigidbodyParticles.rigidbodyInterpolation
member.summary: The rigidbody interpolation to use for each particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidRigidbodyParticles.physicMaterial
member.summary: The physic material to use for each particle.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidRigidbodyParticles.rigidbodies
member.summary: Provides access to the rigidbody array used for fluid particles. The index of the rigidbody in the array corresponds to the index of the particle in the fluid's particle array.
member.remarks: Modifying rigidbodies directly may produce non-physical behaviour. Do not destroy these objects!

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidTriggerSound
member.summary: FluidPlugin that plays an audio source upon entering a trigger.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidTriggerSound.audioSource
member.summary: The audio source to play.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidTriggerSound.scalePitchWithTime
member.summary: Whether or not the audio source's pitch should scale with the time scale.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidTriggerSound.onlyPlayIfFluidIsPlaying
member.summary: If enabled, audio will pause whenever the fluid is paused.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidTriggerSound.minTriggerCount
member.summary: The minimum amount of particles that must be in the trigger to play the audio source.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidTriggerSound.fadeTime
member.summary: The fade time of the audio source.

member.name: P:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.Plugins.FluidTriggerSound.bounds
member.summary: The bounds of the trigger.

SPH simulation solver.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.ResetDelegate
member.summary: Reset delegate. Fires for objects that are reset.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.AllocationDelegate
member.summary: Allocation delegate. Fires whenever memory is reallocated on a fluid.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.SolverDelegate
member.summary: Fluid solver delegate. These fire at different points as the solver runs.

member.name: T:ThinksquirrelSoftware.Fluvio.ObjectModel.FluidEmissionCallback
member.summary: Fluid emission callback. This fires for each particle emission.
